description: DAG run object representing a single execution instance of a DAG

dag_run_id.description: Unique identifier for the DAG run

dag_id.description: The DAG ID this run belongs to

run_id.description: Run ID for the DAG run

state.description: Current state of the DAG run

execution_date.description: Logical execution date of the DAG run

created_at.description: When the DAG run was created

updated_at.description: When the DAG run was last updated

queued_at.description: When the DAG run was queued

data_interval_start.description: Start of the data interval for this run

data_interval_end.description: End of the data interval for this run

conf.description: Configuration parameters for this DAG run

external_trigger.description: Whether this run was externally triggered

note.description: Note attached to the DAG run

logical_date.description: Logical date of the DAG run (same as execution_date)
